mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture,b.flag, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typeName, t.id typeId, u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id order by b.update_time desc
select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.type_id, b.published, t.id typeId, t.name typeName from t_blog b, t_type t where b.type_id = t.id order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typeName, t.id typeId, u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typeName, t.id typeId, t1.name tagName, t1.id tagId, u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u, t_blog_tags tb, t_tag t1 where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = t1.id and t1.id = #{tagId} order by b.update_time desc
select id, title ,first_picture , description ,views from t_blog order by views desc limit 0,4
select id, title, recommend ,first_picture ,views from t_blog order by update_time desc limit 0,3

select b.id, b.published, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.type_id, b.tag_ids, b.first_picture, b.description, b.recommend, b.share_statement, b.appreciation, b.commentable from t_blog b where b.id = #{id} ;

select b.id, b.first_picture, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.update_time,b.commentable, b.share_statement, b.appreciation,b.description, u.nickname,u.avatar, tag.id tagid, tag.name tagname from t_blog b, t_user u, t_tag tag, t_blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = tag.id and b.id = #{id}

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and (b.title like #{pattern} or b.content like #{pattern}) order by b.update_time desc

/*模糊查询*/ select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.published, b.type_id, t.id, t.name from t_blog b ,t_type t
b.type_id = t.id /*博客类型id=类型id*/
and b.type_id = #{typeId} /*根据博客类型查询*/
and b.recommend = #{recommend} /*根据博客推荐查询*/
and b.title like #{pattern} /*根据博客title模糊查询*/
mapper.update: update t_blog set published = #{published},flag = #{flag} , title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type_id = #{typeId}, tag_ids = #{tagIds}, first_picture = #{firstPicture} , description = #{description} , recommend = #{recommend} , share_statement = #{shareStatement}, appreciation = #{appreciation}, commentable = #{commentable} ,update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into t_blog (title, content, first_picture, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentable,published, recommend, create_time, update_time, type_id, tag_ids, user_id, description) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{firstPicture}, #{flag}, #{views}, #{appreciation}, #{shareStatement}, #{commentable}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{typeId}, #{tagIds}, #{userId}, #{description});
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y') from t_blog b order by b.update_time desc
mapper.update: update t_blog b set b.views = #{value} where b.id = #{id}
